languages.text: "Странное сравнение, игнорирующее массу деталей. Впрочем, оно вполне объясняется узостью специализации — и внимания".

traits.locale_text: "Странное сравнение, игнорирующее массу деталей. Впрочем, оно вполне объясняется узостью специализации — и внимания".

languages.text: "An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."
languages.original_text: "Странное сравнение, игнорирующее массу деталей. Впрочем, оно вполне объясняется узостью специализации — и внимания".

traits.locale_text: "An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."
"An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."
"An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."
"An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."
"An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."
"An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."

languages.text: «Una comparación peculiar que omite muchos detalles. No obstante, la limitada envergadura de su especialidad la explica a la perfección».
languages.original_text: "An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."

languages.text: 「多くの詳細が省略された奇妙な比較ですね。ですが、それもあなたの専門性の狭さと集中力を考えれば、十分に説明がつきます」
languages.original_text: "An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."

languages.text: “这样的比较非常古怪，而且忽视了许多细节。不过，考虑到你仅仅关注你的专业领域，这样的结论也不足为奇。”
languages.original_text: "An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."

languages.text: "Ein seltsamer Vergleich, der viele Details außer Acht lässt. Allerdings erklärt er sich durch die Eingeschränktheit Euer Spezialisierung ... und Euren Fokus."
languages.original_text: "An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."

languages.text: « Une comparaison pour le moins étrange, et qui semble omettre de nombreux détails. Néanmoins, j'imagine que cela s'explique par l'étroitesse de votre spécialisation… et de votre esprit. »
languages.original_text: "An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."
"An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."

languages.text: "Pek çok ayrıntıyı dâhil etmeyen tuhaf bir kıyaslama. Ancak uzmanlık alanının ve odak noktanın dar görüşü açısından tam açıklığa kavuştu."
languages.original_text: "An odd comparison that omits many details. However, it is fully explained by your narrowness of specialisation — and focus."
